channel.title: Insane Blow [Drugs]
channel.description:
[b]Recuirements:[/b] [i]1 Joint (either hasj or weed), 1 guy/girl who can give blows.... (excuse my spelling :p )[/i]
[b]How:[/b] [i]1: Someone sits on the ground, the other person starts giving a blow [/i] [i] 2: THe one who GETS the blow, stands up when he starts to inhale.[/i] [i] 3: When he is up, someone should beat his/her chest pretty hard, against a wall, until he/she falls on the ground.[/i] [i] 4: He might be on the ground for 5 min, but afterwards he/she'll feel realy high :D [/i]
* TESTED *
Hope you enjoy it :)

item.title: Insane Blow [Drugs]
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Ok, lemme explain :
Person A= Give the blow
Person B= Gets the blow
Person A stands towards Person B with their hands next to their mouths, as close as possible :
Person A puts a cigarette or joint (but only the very last part near the filter) in his mouth, with the filter side towards Person B, then Person A inhales a little bit of the smoke, and starts blowing everything out , at that point Person B starts to inhale, and that’s called a blow

Read full topic
